mapper.select: select * from hotel_room hr,bed_kind bk where hotel_id = #{param1} and hr.bed_id = #{param2} and hr.bed_id = bk.bed_id

hotel_id,

update hotel_room
bed_id = #{bedId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_price = #{roomPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
room_pic = #{roomPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where hotel_room_id = #{hotelRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hotel_room set bed_id = #{bedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_price = #{roomPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, room_pic = #{roomPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where hotel_room_id = #{hotelRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
